imdb.title: Hataraku Maou-sama!
imdb.plot: Hilarity and fun ensues when Satan ends up in modern day Japan without any magic to return, and starts working part time in a fast food joint.

episodes.title: The Devil Screams in Sasazuka
episodes.plot: Maou and company face their usual budget crisis while Emi and Suzuno attempt to have a conversation next door. Before long, a bloodcurdling scream will rend the night.

episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Inconceivably Become Parents
episodes.plot: Alas Ramus seems dead set on the idea that Maou and Emi are her parents. Her boss at MgRonald's isn't thrilled about all of this, but Chiho may have a future in the Devil's army.

episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Go to the Amusement Park as Advised
episodes.plot: Maou, Emi, and Alas Ramus have an eventful day at the amusement park. Meanwhile, their three stalkers do their not-so-great best to blend in.

episodes.title: The Devil Learns the Pain of Losing Something Precious
episodes.plot: Emi attends a sleepover at the Devil's Castle. But in the morning, the fight for Alas Ramus and the sacred sword begins. Will Maou and Emi win? Will Gabriel take what's precious? Will there be a magical girl transformation sequence?.

episodes.title: The Devil Preaches Human Interaction
episodes.plot: Buying the Devil's TV is more exciting than anyone expected. Unrelatedly, Maou is wiser about human relationships than anyone expected.

episodes.title: The Devil Arrives in Sasazuka
episodes.plot: When the lord of demons and his horde waged war against the humans in their realm, a hero vanquished their army. Cornered, the Devil fled through an interdimensional portal to Earth. He vows to one day reign again, but until then... he needs a job!

episodes.title: The Hero Stays at the Devil's Castle for Work Reasons
episodes.plot: Emilia the hero finally tracks down the ruler of demons on Earth. Meanwhile, Sadao receives a mysterious text from Chiho warning that more earthquakes are on the way.

episodes.title: The Devil Goes on a Date with His Junior in Shinjuku
episodes.plot: Something supernatural seems to be going on with Chiho. Meanwhile, it's possible Maou seems to have a difficult time understanding certain concepts.

episodes.title: The Hero Experiences Human Warmth
episodes.plot: In the aftermath of the cave-in, Emi sees a side of Maou that doesn't jive with the demonic king. Meanwhile, everyone sees a side of the landlady that nobody could have expected.

episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Save Sasazuka
episodes.plot: Lucifer is wrecking the neighborhood in a big way and he's brought along some unexpected friends! Meanwhile, Emi, Maou, and Ashiya do the impossible and try to work together!

episodes.title: The Devil Climbs the Stairway to School
episodes.plot: Back on Ente Isla, the other high priests find out about Olba's betrayal. Meanwhile, Lucifer's moved into the Devil's Castle.

episodes.title: The Devil's Budget Is Saved by Neighborliness
episodes.plot: Maou and company find that a young lady named Suzuno has moved in next door. She is quick to make friends but Emi wonders what her motives are.

episodes.title: The Hero Enters the Fray
episodes.plot: Big problems arise when when a new fast-food restaurant opens up. Meanwhile Emi and Suzuno have many miscommunication problems.

episodes.title: The Hero Experiences a Fray
episodes.plot: Maou tries to handle the loss of business caused by the opening of a new restaurant. Meanwhile Emi and Suzuno need an impartial third party to resolve their dispute.

episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Take a Break from the Daily Routine
episodes.plot: It's a busy day at the local amusement park, with crowded restaurants, animals on the loose, scary ghosts, and a much-needed swimwear intervention. Meanwhile, Suzuno feels the presence of a white-winged being watching her.

episodes.title: The Hero Stays True to Her Convictions
episodes.plot: An encounter with a stranger has Suzuno reconsidering her position on the Devil. Meanwhile, Yusa begins stalking Sadao and Shiro around town and learns that they are living good, humble lives.

episodes.title: The Devil Carries Out His Duties
episodes.plot: The archangel Sariel is willing to torture people to get what he wants. Soon, Satan and Sariel engage in an aerial battle that destroys half of the city.

episodes.title: The Devil and the Hero Do Some Honest Hard Work
episodes.plot: Ashiya has something he needs to talk to his master about in private. Meanwhile, Emi also has a strange dream where Satan conquers Sasakuza.
